name: autorouter
description: A library for intelligent routing in visual diagramming tools

scripts.build-min: node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js index.js -d --s AutoRouter | node node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs -c > dist/autorouter.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build-debug && npm run build-min

author: Brian Broll
